definition: someone who tries to get things at no cost, for example as hand-me-downs or by finding things that are unused or discarded
details:
noun
- someone who tries to get things at no cost, for example as hand-me-downs or by finding things that are unused or discarded
= example: someone who tries to get things at no cost, for example as hand-me-downs or by finding things that are unused or discarded
= synonyms: moocher
